message.content:
<<<api>>>: ArrayList.toArray
<<<code>>>: int[] n = new int[x.size()];
for(int i = 0; i < x.size(); i++){
  n[i] = x.get(i);
}
<<<explanation>>>: You cannot directly cast an Object array to a primitive array. Instead, you can create a new int array with the same size as the ArrayList and then iterate over the ArrayList to populate the int array with the values.
